infos.title: Grand Elidoran Scholar
infos.story: The Great Sage of Elidora is the wisest of the Druids. As one of the heroes who fought against the demon invaders 100 years ago, she is often considered the wisest person on the entire Orbis continent. She has taught and trained countless Elves, and possesses keen insight and mystic powers befitting her age. It is said even the current king of Elidora as well as his children were once all her students. Having recently sensed a strange disturbance from the Elidora forest, she is preparing the path for the wielder of the holy sword.
infos.story_: The Great Sage of Elidora is the wisest of the Druids. As one of the heroes who fought against the Demon invaders 100 years ago, she is often considered the wisest person on the entire Orbis Continent. She has taught and trained countless Elves, and possesses keen insight and mystic powers befitting her age. It is said that even the current king of Elidora as well as his children were all once her students. Having recently sensed a strange disturbance from the Elidora Forest, she is preparing the path for the wielder of the Holy Sword.

1.name: Thornbush Forest
1.description: Attacks a random enemy and its nearby enemies 3 times, dealing a total of ??? M.DMG and inflicting Stun for 3 sec.

2.name: Seed of Belladonna
2.description: Creates a Seed of Belladonna around the target for 10 sec. The seed deals ??? M.DMG to nearby enemies every 2 sec, increasing M.DMG the target takes by 30% and reducing Heal Rate by 30% for 5 sec.

3.name: Wrath of the Forest
3.description: Attacks enemies within a wide frontal range of self 6 times, dealing a total of ??? M.DMG and knocking them down for 3 sec.

4.name: Poison
4.description: Normal and Skill attacks inflicts Poison on a target, dealing a total of ??? continuous M.DMG and reducing Heal Rate by 5% over 20 sec. Poison can be stacked up to max 5 times. If Lorraine dies, Poison effect on enemies will disappear.

light.effect: Reduces Mana of the hit target by 250. Reduces Mana by 500 if the target is a boss.

dark.effect: Recovers own Mana by 250 upon a Critical Hit.
The duration of the CC on hit enemies increases by 30% for 5 sec.

light.effect: Mana cost is increased by 1 but DMG is boosted by 100%.

dark.effect: Increases Mana Cost by 1 and dispels positive effects of enemies within range.

light.effect: Reduces the target's ATK by 5% per stack of Poison.

dark.effect: If the target is a boss, increases DMG of Poison by x3.

At the beginning of each battle, immediately reduces all Skill Cooldown of self by 30% and increases DMG dealt to Non-Hero enemies by 20% for 90 sec. DMG Boost effect stacks up to max 5 times and is irremovable.

uw.name: World Tree's Will, Roburu
uw.description: Deals M.DMG equal to (0) of ATK to enemies inflicted with Poison every 7 secm reducing M.DEF by (1) and increasing M.DMG the target takes by (2) for 10 sec.
uw.story: The legend has it that, once every 100 years, the World Tree bestows one of its branches to a chosen one. The branch radiates with eternal life, granting immense power and knowledge to its owner. Fusing the branch with the Stone of the Forest, an Elven treasure, Lorraine created this staff. Now, she can call upon the forces of nature and remain connected to the World Tree wherever she goes.

1.name: Book of Life
1.description: [Thornbush Forest] Increases DMG by 50% and reduces Cooldown by (0).
1.story: The Book containing knowledge about all life in the forest. A magical book passed down among the guardians of the World Tree since ancient times. After being in the hands of Elidoran sages for a long time, Lorraine now has it in safekeeping.

2.name: Deadly Belladonna
2.description: [Seed of Belladonna] Reduces Mana Cost by 1, Mana of hit enemies by (0), and recovers own Mana by (1).
2.story: The beautiful but poisonous Belladonna. It's a dangerous plant that only the Great Sage can handle. The little Belladonna that is mixed up with vines poisons enemies and makes them defenseless against magic attacks.

3.name: Root of the World Tree
3.description: [Wrath of the Forest] DMG is increased by (0). Upon Crit Hit on enemies with over 5 stacks of Poison, skill cooldown is reduced by 4%.
3.story: Proof of the unity between the Druids and the World Tree. The great sages of Elidora have always maintained a deep bond with the World Tree. The roots of the World Tree are proof of the deep bond with the Druids. They attack enemies with supernatural DMG whenever Druids shout the Wrath of the Forest to show nature's fury and hostility.

4.name: Terrarium of Circulation
4.description: [Poison] Poison effect becomes irremovable and for the duration of Poison, target takes (0) increased M.DMG
4.story: A terrarium made with a broken World Tree twig. As breaking of twigs of the World Tree is considered very bad luck, they are normally purified and discarded. However, Lorraine received a new revelation from it and decided to make a small terrarium out of it.

sw.description: Summons the soul of World Tree's Will, Roburu for 10 sec, dealing ??? DMG on a random enemy every 2 sec, increasing M.DMG it takes by 30% for 10 sec and inflicting Shackle for 2 sec. Also recovers own Mana by 500 and reduces Cooldown of all Skills by 1 sec every 2 sec.

advancement.1: Increases own ATK by 50% for the duration of soul.
advancement.2: Increases the duration of CC effects applied upon enemies by 30% and reduces thier M.DEF by 25% for the duration of soul.

sw.story:
A World Tree branch is the core of Roburu, and it has a strong lifeforce which it inherited from the world tree.

The infinite lifeforce amplifies Lorraine's magic, while also imbuing Roburu with the characteristic of 'growing staff'. The branch stayed inside the weapon, and watched Lorraine silently over time. As a druid, as a mentor of the royal family, as a friend and advisor to the old hero. Lorraine went through many processes of agony, and at the end of everything, when the time to make a choice approached, the branch chose Lorraine as its rightful master.
The branch chose to grow as a staff, together with Lorraine instead of growing into a new World Tree.
Roburu now draws power and potential from the World Tree, and together with Lorraine, they will protect the forest together.
